getCacheEntryCount

public int getCacheEntryCount()
从接口 Persister 复制的描述
Returns the number of key/value pairs in this Persister object.

If the underlying technology (e.g., Memcached) does not support this operation, then the implementation may return 0 or a java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException.

This number may include expired entries, depending on the implementation. Some implementations clean up expired entries only when the value is requested or at certain time intervals (or not at all).

指定者：
接口 Persister 中的 getCacheEntryCount
返回：
the number of entries in this Persister

setAsynch

public void setAsynch(java.lang.String key,
                      java.lang.Object value,
                      int period)
从接口 Persister 复制的描述
Set a value for a key without waiting for the operation to complete.

This method is useful in the case where the underlying implementation uses a network but the caller should not be delayed by the network operation.

Because the set operation is not neccessarily complete when the method returns, a subsequent get call may return stale data.

period specifies the time-to-live for this key/value pair. For calls to get or getObject after the specified period, the Persister object will return null.

指定者：
接口 Persister 中的 setAsynch
参数：
key - the key
value - the value
period - the maximum interval of time during which this key/value pair is valid. Also know as time-to-live. -1 indicates an infinite time-to-live.

set

public void set(java.lang.String key,
                java.lang.Object value,
                int period)
从接口 Persister 复制的描述
Set a value for a key.

period specifies the time-to-live for this key/value pair. For calls to get or getObject after the specified period, the Persister object will return null.

指定者：
接口 Persister 中的 set
参数：
key - the key
value - the value
period - the maximum interval of time during which this key/value pair is valid. Also know as time-to-live. -1 indicates an infinite time-to-live.

get

public java.lang.Object get(java.lang.String key)
从接口 Persister 复制的描述
Get the value associated with a specified key. If the period (aka time-to-live) for this key/value pair is expired, the get will return null.

指定者：
接口 Persister 中的 get
参数：
key - the key

getBulk

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getBulk(java.lang.String[] keys)
从接口 Persister 复制的描述
Get the values associated with a list of keys.

getBulk returns a Map containing an entry for each key/value pair. The map contains an entry for a specified key only if that key exists in the Persister and the associated key/value pair is not yet expired.

指定者：
接口 Persister 中的 getBulk
参数：
keys - a list of keys

getObject

public java.lang.Object getObject(java.lang.String key)
从接口 Persister 复制的描述
This is a method to help support some implementations whose underlying technology encodes the value associated with a key. In some cases, the value may have been stored by a client that uses a form of encoding not supported by the Persister's implementation. In that case, one might want the raw, yet-to-be-decoded value associated with the key.

getObject retrieves the raw, unencoded value associated with a key. In all other respects, it's the same as Persister.get(java.lang.String).

It's likely you will never need to call this method. If the period (aka time-to-live) for this key/value pair is expired, the get will return null.

指定者：
接口 Persister 中的 getObject

getBulkObjects

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getBulkObjects(java.lang.String[] keys)
从接口 Persister 复制的描述
As with Persister.getObject(java.lang.String), this is a method to help support some implementations whose underlying technology encodes result.

It's likely you will never need to call this method.

In all other respects, it is the same as Persister.getBulk(java.lang.String[]).

指定者：
接口 Persister 中的 getBulkObjects

remove

public void remove(java.lang.String key)
从接口 Persister 复制的描述
Removes the entry for the specified key from the Persister object.

指定者：
接口 Persister 中的 remove
参数：
key - the key of the entry to be removed

cleanOutGarbage

public int cleanOutGarbage()
从接口 Persister 复制的描述
Forces the initiation of the process that cleans up expired entries.

Normally, you would not call this method. The implementation takes care of the timing of the cleanup process.

In some implementations, this method may be a no-op.

指定者：
接口 Persister 中的 cleanOutGarbage

keySet

public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> keySet()
从接口 Persister 复制的描述
Returns a Set of the keys contained in this Persister object.

The Set may contain keys for expired entries, depending on how often the underlying implementation cleans up expired entries.

The underlying technology may not support this operation. As a result, some implementations return an empty set.

指定者：
接口 Persister 中的 keySet
返回：
a Set of the keys contained in this Persister object.
